title: #17: How to work with Instagram, Reaching out to brands, and can women make the first move
description:
On this episode we talk about Instagram and their new updates. We talk about joining the network PodcastOne, how to reach out to brands, and we discuss if women can make the first move. 

To learn more about The Skinny Confidential visit the site HERE
